data.comment: The match has started at Easter Road.
Aberdeen have been awarded a penalty in Edinburgh...
In the minute 39, Goal! Lewis Ferguson gives Aberdeen a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 54, The home team replace Scott Allan with Murphy.
Lewis Ferguson for Aberdeen has been booked by Nick Walsh and receives a first yellow card.
Stevie Mallan is replacing Josh Doig for the home team.
In the minute 67, Aberdeen make their first substitution with Dylan McGeouch replacing Scott Wright.
The home team have replaced Melker Hallberg with Jamie Gullan. This is the third substitution made today by Jack Ross.
Curtis Main is on a sub for Marley Watkins for Aberdeen.
In the minute 77, Derek McInnes is making the team's third substitution at Easter Road with Niall McGinn replacing Ryan Hedges.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
